```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import altair as alt

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    head = print(df.head())
    description = df.describe()
    his = alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(
      alt.X('Random Numbers:Q', title = 'Random Numbers'),
      y = 'count()'
    )
    return [head, description, his]

preview_data(data)
```
